strings.meteoSwissExposureLabel: Estimated people exposed to windspeed above {windspeed}m/s
strings.meteoSwissEstimatesNote: These impact estimates are derived from a model and come with very high uncertainty. More information will be added soon.
strings.meteoSwissEventDescription: {model} has forecasted a tropical cyclone on {updatedAt}. The tropical cyclone named {eventName} is forecasted to impact {countryName} from {eventDate}.
